summary: The implementation comprehensively covers all specified requirements. Owner-only video uploads are enforced via Internet Identity authentication and admin role checks. The video feed is publicly accessible without authentication. A TikTok-style profile page, video feed with grid layout, and video player are implemented. The visual theme uses warm orange/red tones (avoiding blue/purple) with modern typography and smooth animations throughout. All acceptance criteria appear satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal and user profile management system
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention user profiles, profile creation modals, or username/bio functionality. REQ-3 only requests displaying 'creator's profile information' but the diff implements a full profile system where authenticated users can create/edit profiles with names stored in backend state.

The BuildRequest does not request any sessionStorage utility functionality. The implementation includes comprehensive URL parameter parsing and session storage utilities that go beyond authentication requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: User role-based access control system with admin/user/guest roles
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-1 requires owner authentication, the implementation includes a full role-based system with mixins and access control state management. The BuildRequest only specifies 'owner vs non-owner' distinction, not a multi-role system.
